alert.note: Alert for South Slopes of the Western Brooks Range; Upper Kobuk Valleys (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 16 at 2:37AM AKST until January 16 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST TODAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 inches. Winds gusting to 40 mph will create blowing and drifting snow with visibility reduced to one half mile at times. * WHERE...South Slopes of the Western Brooks Range and Upper Kobuk Valleys. * WHEN...Until noon AKST today. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible.

area.areaDesc: South Slopes of the Western Brooks Range; Upper Kobuk Valleys
